# PropertyKey.PropertyId property

Gets a value that represents a StructureId field from which the value is to be retrieved.

```csharp
public Enum PropertyId { get; }
```

## Property Value

Field of StructureId from which the value will be retrieved.

## Remarks

The value of the attribute represents the type of the value linked to this property.
